messages.content: You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A student in a library
Why did the student bring a ladder to the library? Because they heard the knowledge was on the top shelf! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A cat sitting on a computer keyboard
Why don't cats work on computers? Because they keep pressing 'paws'! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A chef who over-salts everything
Why did the chef start a rock band? Because he was all about that bass, no treble! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A knight getting ready for a battle
Why was the knight always calm before battle? Because he was good at keeping his 'armor' cool! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A clown at a job interview
Why did the clown bring a pie to the interview? He heard it was important to break the ice! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A vampire at a blood drive
Why did the vampire go to the blood drive? To improve his LinkedIn 'connections'! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A pirate walking into a bar
Why did the pirate walk into a bar? Because he heard they had a 'captain's special' on the 'high seas'! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A dinosaur learning to dance
Why did the dinosaur take up salsa? Because the 'Tyrannosaurus Flex' was already his signature move! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
An astronaut doing laundry
Why did the astronaut bring soap into space? Because he wanted to rocket clean! Haha
You are an assistant that creates funny one-line jokes based on a given scenario.
A wizard at the supermarket
Why did the wizard shop at the supermarket? Because the 'produce' section was truly enchanting! Haha
